001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.common;
003
004import java.math.BigDecimal;
005import java.math.RoundingMode;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009import javax.money.*;
010import javax.money.Monetary;
011
012import com.commercetools.money.MonetaryProvider;
013import com.commercetools.money.MonetarySupplier;
014
015import org.javamoney.moneta.spi.DefaultRoundingProvider;
016
017/**
018 * Utility methods to convert from {@link MonetaryAmount} to {@link Money} and vice versa
019 */
020public class MoneyUtil {
021    private static final MonetaryProvider MONETARY_PROVIDER;
022    protected static final DefaultRoundingProvider ROUNDING_PROVIDER = new DefaultRoundingProvider();
023
024    static {
025        MONETARY_PROVIDER = MonetarySupplier.instance();
026    }
027
028    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final Money money) {
029        if (money instanceof TypedMoneyDraft) {
030            return toMonetaryAmount((TypedMoneyDraft) money);
031        }
032        if (money instanceof TypedMoney) {
033            return toMonetaryAmount((TypedMoney) money);
034        }
035        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(), Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode()));
036    }
037
038    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final TypedMoneyDraft money) {
039        if (money instanceof HighPrecisionMoneyDraft) {
040            return toMonetaryAmount((HighPrecisionMoneyDraft) money);
041        }
042        return toMonetaryAmount((CentPrecisionMoneyDraft) money);
043    }
044
045    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final CentPrecisionMoneyDraft money) {
046        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
047        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(),
048            Optional.ofNullable(money.getFractionDigits()).orElse(unit.getDefaultFractionDigits()), unit);
049    }
050
051    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final HighPrecisionMoneyDraft money) {
052        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
053        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getPreciseAmount(), money.getFractionDigits(), unit);
054    }
055
056    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final TypedMoney money) {
057        if (money instanceof HighPrecisionMoney) {
058            return toMonetaryAmount((HighPrecisionMoney) money);
059        }
060        return toMonetaryAmount((CentPrecisionMoney) money);
061    }
062
063    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final CentPrecisionMoney money) {
064        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
065        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(),
066            Optional.ofNullable(money.getFractionDigits()).orElse(unit.getDefaultFractionDigits()), unit);
067    }
068
069    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final HighPrecisionMoney money) {
070        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
071        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getPreciseAmount(), money.getFractionDigits(), unit);
072    }
073
074    public static MonetaryAmount zeroAmount(final String currency) {
075        return zeroAmount(Monetary.getCurrency(currency));
076    }
077
078    public static MonetaryAmount zeroAmount(final CurrencyUnit currency) {
079        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(0, currency);
080    }
081
082    public static CentPrecisionMoney of(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount) {
083        return CentPrecisionMoneyBuilder.of()
084                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
085                .fractionDigits(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getDefaultFractionDigits())
086                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
087                .build();
088    }
089
090    public static HighPrecisionMoney of(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount, final int fractionDigits) {
091        return HighPrecisionMoneyBuilder.of()
092                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
093                .preciseAmount(amountToPreciseAmount(monetaryAmount, fractionDigits))
094                .fractionDigits(fractionDigits)
095                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
096                .build();
097    }
098
099    public static CentPrecisionMoneyDraft draftOf(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount) {
100        return CentPrecisionMoneyDraftBuilder.of()
101                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
102                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
103                .build();
104    }
105
106    public static HighPrecisionMoneyDraft draftOf(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount, final int fractionDigits) {
107        return HighPrecisionMoneyDraftBuilder.of()
108                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
109                .preciseAmount(amountToPreciseAmount(monetaryAmount, fractionDigits))
110                .fractionDigits(fractionDigits)
111                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
112                .build();
113    }
114
115    public static long amountToCents(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount) {
116        final MonetaryRounding ROUNDING = ROUNDING_PROVIDER.getRounding(
117            RoundingQueryBuilder.of().setRoundingName("default").setCurrency(monetaryAmount.getCurrency()).build());
118        return monetaryAmount.with(ROUNDING).query(amount -> queryFrom(monetaryAmount).longValue());
119    }
120
121    public static long amountToPreciseAmount(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount, final int fractionDigits) {
122        final MonetaryRounding ROUNDING = ROUNDING_PROVIDER.getRounding(
123            RoundingQueryBuilder.of().setRoundingName("default").setCurrency(monetaryAmount.getCurrency()).build());
124        return monetaryAmount.with(ROUNDING).query(amount -> queryFrom(monetaryAmount, fractionDigits).longValue());
125    }
126
127    protected static BigDecimal queryFrom(final MonetaryAmount amount) {
128        Objects.requireNonNull(amount, "Amount required.");
129        BigDecimal number = amount.getNumber().numberValue(BigDecimal.class);
130        CurrencyUnit cur = amount.getCurrency();
131        number = number.setScale(Math.max(0, cur.getDefaultFractionDigits()), RoundingMode.HALF_EVEN);
132        return number.movePointRight(number.scale());
133    }
134
135    protected static BigDecimal queryFrom(final MonetaryAmount amount, final int fractionsDigit) {
136        Objects.requireNonNull(amount, "Amount required.");
137        BigDecimal number = amount.getNumber().numberValue(BigDecimal.class);
138        number = number.setScale(fractionsDigit, RoundingMode.HALF_EVEN);
139        return number.movePointRight(number.scale());
140    }
141}
